label: dog
caption: A playful black and white dog, its fur matted in places from a day at the beach, stands triumphantly on the sand with a bright red Frisbee clutched tightly between its jaws. The warm sunlight catches the wispy strands of seaweed tangled in the dog's fur as it surveys its surroundings, its tail wagging lazily behind it. In the distance, the gentle waves lap at the shore, sending tiny plumes of sand dancing upwards into the air.
